text: Oleg (), known as Oleg the Wise, Oleg of Novgorod or Oleg of Kiev, was a Varangian prince of the Rus' who became the first prince of Kiev, thereby laying the foundations of the Kievan Rus' state. ==References== Category:9th- century people Category:10th-century people Category:Monarchs in Europe
title: Oleg the Wise
